name: Baby Powder
description:
Baby Powder


Pediatricians agree that baby powder should not contain talc because it causes danger when inhaled. Here's a safe and organic, talc free option - absorbs moisture better and prevents friction between the baby's bottom and the diaper.

Instructions

Shake lightly to diaper area to prevent chafing and rash. Great to use on body after bathing.

 

Ingredients

*Organic

name: Bum Butter
description:
Bum Butter


 

Did you know that non-organic diaper ointments use petrochemicals, preservatives, and fillers? You baby deserves better! Our BUM BUTTER with Lavender and Roman Chamomile is a nourishing organic salve for protecting, healing and lubricating baby's delicate skin. No preservatives or toxins; use with confidence on your baby.

Instructions

Apply a small amount as needed at every diaper change to relieve and prevent chafed and irritated skin.

 

Ingredients

Comfrey root infused olive oil*, jojoba oil*, shea butter*, coconut oil*, unfiltered beeswax*, and the essential oils of roman chamomile and lavender*.

 

*Organic

name: Baby Oil
description:
Mainstream baby oils are loaded with petroleum by-products which can clog pores and cause irritation. Your baby deserves better. BABY OIL with Roman Chamomile soothes and protects skin and can be used in the bath or directly on baby's skin. Also provides anti-inflammatory properties and nourishes tender skin. No toxins, fillers, or artificial ingredients and made with homemade calendula infused olive oil.

Instructions

Rub gently on your baby, or put a few drops into bath water.

 

Ingredients

Calendula infused olive oil*, jojoba oil*, soybean oil*, sweet almond oil*, roman chamomile* and lavender* essential oils

name: Organic Baby Gift Basket
description:
Organic Baby Gift Basket


 

Soothe, protect, and treat with all three organic baby products. Safe for baby, using only the highest quality ingredients with no toxins, parabens, or fillers

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Formulated just for baby with safe, organic ingredients. Kit includes:

 

4 oz Baby Oil

4 oz. Bum Butter

3.75 oz. Baby Talc-Free Powder

Bamboo Wash Cloth

name: BELLY BUTTER FOR MOMS - ORGANIC
description:
If your stretching tummy is itchy and you are want to protect your skin from stretch marks, use BELLY BUTTER. It's an excellent emollient formulated specifically for pregnant tummies* and hips, to soothe and take care of growing skin. Reduce your toxic load. No fillers, additives or preservatives. Safe ingredients for you and your baby.

Instructions

Gently massage a small amount around entire stomach and hip area twice daily.

 

Ingredients

Jojoba oil, coconut oil, shea butter, olive oil, and unfiltered beeswax.

 

*Note: Based on research, no essential oils are added to this product
